subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Novak Djokovic will face the defending champion, Roger Federer, in the final of the Dubai Championships after a win over Tomas Berdych, 6-0, 5-7, 6-4. Federer defeated Borna Coric, 6-2, 6-1.
snippet: Top-seeded Novak Djokovic will face the defending champion, Roger Federer, in the final of the Dubai Championships after a win over Tomas Berdych, 6-0, 5-7, 6-4. Federer defeated Borna Coric, 6-2, 6-1.
